div.p: PURCHASE PARAGRAPH IMPACT SEGMENT TONIGHT.
IF PRESIDENT OBAMA DOESN’T START SOLVING PROBLEMS SOON.
HIS ADMINISTRATION IS LIKELY TO GO DOWN IN HISTORY AS ONE
OF THE WORST. JOINING US FROM WASHINGTON
MARY KATHARINE HAM AND IN THE STUDIO JUAN WILLIAMS
BOTH FOX NEWS ANALYSTS. HAVE YOU BEEN VERY GENEROUS
TO THE PRESIDENT. I THINK PRESIDENT OBAMA IS
RIGHT. HE IS HEADED FOR -- I THINK
BRIT HUME IS RIGHT IS HE HEADING COUNSEL TO HISTORY
AS A BIG TROUBLE. >> I DISAGREE.
HE IS IN TROUBLE. THERE IS NO QUESTION THERE
IS A DOUBT ABOUT HIS ABILITY TO REACT CONSTRUCTIVELY AND
GET IT DONE CONSTRUCTIVELY AS FAR AS BIPARTISANSHIP.
THIS IMMIGRATION REFORM THING HAS NOT HAPPENED.
>> WHEN YOU HAVE AL BAGHDADI DEFYING HIM.
SPEAKING IN MOSUL, IRAQ. >> THAT WAS AWFUL.
>> WE ARE GOING TO ATTACK EVERYBODY AND WE DON’T CARE.
HE DOESN’T FEAR OBAMA.
>> APPARENTLY HE DOESN’T FEAR ANYTHING.
I DON’T UNDERSTAND WHY WE DIDN’T TAKE THAT GUY OUT.
>> I DON’T EITHER. THEY LET HIM OUT.
>> THAT’S BEFORE.
HE IS GOING TO STAND UP IN
MOSUL, I WOULD THINK THAT WE COULD LOCATE HIM AND KILL
HIM. >> I DON’T KNOW ABOUT THAT
AWFUL I KNOW IS THAT YOU HAVE THIS ARMY NOW THAT IS
NOW ENTRENCHED. THEY ARE FEARLESS.
THEY WILL DON’T THINK THAT WE ARE GOING TO DO ANYTHING
AND FOR WEEKS PRESIDENT OBAMA HAS DITHERED AND DONE
NOTHING WHEN HE COULD HAVE DEGRADED THAT ARMY FROM THE
AIR. WE HAVE THE ABILITY TO DO
IT. HE DOESN’T PULL THE TRIGGER
ON IT AND HE DOESN’T EXPLAIN WHY HE DOESN’T PULL THE
TRIGGER ON IT NOT ABOUT PUTTING ANYBODY ON THE
GROUND, BOOTS IN THE GROUND. IT’S ABOUT DEGRADING AN ARMY
THAT IS THREATENING AMERICA. THEN YOU GO DOWN TO THE
BORDER. AND YOU YOU GO DOWN TO THE
BORDER AND NOW WE HAVE, HE SAYS LAST WEEK YEAH, WE ARE
GOING TO SUPPORT THESE LATEST ED HENRY IN A MOMENT
ON THIS. IT LOOKS LIKE IS HE WEAK.
HE DOESN’T KNOW WHAT TO DO AND HE DOESN’T CARE.
HE IS NOT GOING DOWN TO THE BORDER WHEN HE IS IN TEXAS.
>> HE IS SAYING IS HE GOING TO DEPORT MOST OF THESE
KIDS. >> HE IS SAYING HE MAY NOT.
>> I THINK THE ABC REPORT YOU SHOWED, BILL, INDICATES
THAT IN FACT MOST OF THESE KIDS DON’T SHOW UP FOR THE
DEPORTATION HEARING. AND MIDDLE EAST WHAT YOU
HAVE GOT IS A SITUATION WHERE I THINK WE HAVE GOT TO
BE CAREFUL WHO WE BOMB. WE DON’T WANT TO SUPPORT
ALBA SHIR THE BAD GUY. >> YOU HAVE GOT TO DEGRADE
THESE GUYS SOON. THEY ARE HEADED FOR JORDAN.
ALL RIGHT, MARY KATHARINE, NOW, I’M STILL TRYING TO
FIGURE OUT WHY PRESIDENT OBAMA DOESN’T KNOW WHERE HE
IS. WHERE HE IS.
AND WHERE HE IS, A FAILURE ACROSS THE BORDER.
I DON’T KNOW WHY HE DOESN’T SEE THAT AND DO SOMETHING.
>> YEAH, I DON’T THINK HE SEES IT HERE’S THE THING.
I THINK WE HAVE TALKED ABOUT THIS BEFORE.
HE IS REACTIVE, NOT PROACTIVE.
AND WHEN SOMETHING BECOMES A CRISIS.
HE SUDDENLY DECIDES OKAY, WELL, I GUESS I HAVE TO DO
SOMETHING ABOUT THIS. UNFORTUNATELY OFTEN THE
THING IS I’M GOING TO GIVE A SPEECH AND SET UP A STRAW
MAN AND BURN THAT SUCKER DOWN BY SAYING THERE ARE
SOME WHO SAY THEY ARE PERFECT SOLUTIONS TO THIS
PROBLEM. BUT THIS IS A VERY COMPLEX
PROBLEM. YES, WE UNDERSTAND THAT.
PART OF THE ISSUE BEING THE
PRESIDENT IS THAT FIGURING
OUT WHAT THOSE COMPLEX PROBLEMS ARE EARLIER MAKES
IT EASIER TO DO SOMETHING. >> IT’S WORSE THAN THAT YOU
HAVE GOT A MAYOR OF MUR YET TAX CALIFORNIA SAYING NOBODY
EVEN CALLED ME. JUST SHOWED UP.
NOBODY CALLED US. >> YEAH.
>> THIS IS OUT OF CONTROL
STUFF NOW. I THINK YOU ARE RIGHT, BILL,
YOU ARE RIGHT TO POINT OUT ABOUT THE SPITTING.
OBVIOUSLY THAT AND I THINK
THE MAYOR DID A GOOD JOB OF
CONDEMNING THAT THIS CITY
HAS A RIGHT TO HAVE
QUESTIONS ABOUT HOW WE ARE GOING TO DEAL WITH THIS.
>> ALL THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE THERE HAVE A RIGHT TO SAY
WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO YOU?
ARE SENDING THEM TO US AND WE ARE SUPPOSED TO DO WHAT?
>> IT’S NOT JUST PEOPLE WHO OBJECT TO THIS KIND OF
INFLUX WHO HAVE QUESTIONS. >> EVERYBODY.
>> ASKED THE ADMINISTRATION SEVEN TIMES HOW MANY OF
THESE CENTRAL AMERICAN IMMIGRANTS HAVE BEEN
RELEASED IN THE COUNTRY AND THEY REEF TO ANSWER.
I THINK THAT DOES NOT HELP
THEM GAIN TRUST AND MAKE POLICY.
>> I BELIEVE, JUAN, IF BARACK OBAMA WAS THE CEO OF

SEEING IN THE POLLS, ISN’T IT.
>> DO YOU BELIEVE THAT? IF YOU WERE THE HEAD OF A

>> AT THIS POINT THE NUMBERS -- I THINK HE IS AT

>> I DON’T KNOW IF HE IS
FALLING. >> HE IS FALLING.
>> LET ME JUST SAY. REMEMBER, HE HAS TRIED AND

>> JUAN, WHEN THE SHIP HITS THE ICEBERG.
